lead_paragraph: 7-Eleven expanded its home delivery service to three cities, but its best-known item, the Slurpee, remains off the menu.

headline.main: Home Delivery From 7-Eleven, but the Slurpee Won’t Make It
headline.print_headline: Home Delivery From 7-Eleven, but the Slurpee Won’t Make It

snippet: 7-Eleven expanded its home delivery service to three cities, but its best-known item, the Slurpee, remains off the menu.
